definition: Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Shuili township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan

sentences.english: While it was a great day, I got a bit sunburned in the water.
sentences.chinese: 今天过得很棒，但我在水里把自己给晒伤了。

sentences.english: We put our backpacks on the board and swam in the water pushing the board.
sentences.chinese: 我们把背包放到木板上，推着木板在水里游。

sentences.english: “Take that out right now and warm it under water, ” I say.
sentences.chinese: “把那东西拿到一边去，在水里温一温，”我说。

sentences.english: Will you not this day claim afresh to be immersed and drenched in these waters of life?
sentences.chinese: 今天你愿不愿意浸沉在生命的水里？

sentences.english: They should take to swimming like, er, a duck to water.
sentences.chinese: 呃，它们本应该像鸭子一般在水里游泳。

sentences.english: It must go in, if I have to push it myself.
sentences.chinese: 如果我亲自推它，他必须到水里去。

sentences.english: He goes out in the rain, he walks in the water, he travels in winter.
sentences.chinese: 他常在下雨时出门，在水里行走，在严冬旅行。

sentences.english: And you give a picture of that by going under the water and coming up.
sentences.chinese: 你要表明这一点，就要借着浸入水中和从水里出来。

sentences.english: Coral are found in water with a depth of less than 60 meters.
sentences.chinese: 珊瑚常可在水深不超过60米的水里找到。

sentences.english: Throw a stone into still water and watch the ripples spread in rings .
sentences.chinese: 投一块石头到静止的水里，看涟漪荡漾成圈。

sentences.english: It is known to everyone that stream rises from very hot water.
sentences.chinese: 人人都知道蒸气是从很热的水里冒出来的。

sentences.english: I just escaped from the water and all my belongings were swept away.
sentences.chinese: 我刚从水里逃出来，所有的财产全冲走了。

sentences.english: Teachellong them not to be afraid of the water, I put my face in the water and blew bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 为了让他们不惮水，我把脸埋在水里吹泡泡。

sentences.english: He dived into the water with a splash.
sentences.chinese: 扑通一声，他扎进水里去了。

sentences.english: On land the turtle is ungainly , but in the water it is very agil.
sentences.chinese: 乌龟在陆地上很笨拙，但是在水里却很灵活。

sentences.english: I simply spent those four hours marinating .
sentences.chinese: 这四个小时我就像泡在水里度过的。

definition: Huli district of Xiamen city 廈門市|厦门市[Xia4 men2 shi4] (Amoy), Fujian
edge of the water/waterside/shore (of sea, lake or river)
to fall into water/to sink/overboard/fig. to degenerate/to sink (into depravity)/to go to the dogs
to tread water/to paddle or tramp in shallow water
to have water get in (one's ear, shoes etc)/to get flooded/inflow of water
